name: Paint Wars: Quest
description: You are Michael. He works for President Urik Redfield, and carries documents, when the door is opened, Michael sees Kulenov, who shoots President Urik. Michael has to move to the city of Deham to get rid of the chase. Michael's girlfriend Jen reports a man, Joe White, who knows a lot about the new president. Joe works at a copy of McDonald's. We can hear it on a McAuto-like rack.
